name: @premierstacks/browser-webpack-typescript-react-app-template
description: premierstacks browser webpack typescript react app template

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run stan && npm run test && npm run security
scripts.clean: npm run clean:npm && npm run clean:dist
scripts.commit: npm run local && npm run fix && npm run check
scripts.development: npm run npm:install && npm run clean:dist && npm run webpack:production -- --env APP_ENV=development
scripts.fix: npm run fix:eslint && npm run fix:prettier
scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.local: npm run npm:install && npm run clean:dist && npm run webpack:development -- --env APP_ENV=local
scripts.npm:audit: npm audit --audit-level info --include prod --include dev --include peer --include optional
scripts.npm:install: npm install --install-links --include prod --include dev --include peer --include optional
scripts.npm:update: npm update --install-links --include prod --include dev --include peer --include optional
scripts.production: npm run npm:install && npm run clean:dist && npm run webpack:production -- --env APP_ENV=production
scripts.staging: npm run npm:install && npm run clean:dist && npm run webpack:production -- --env APP_ENV=staging
scripts.test: npm run playwright:install && npm run playwright:test
scripts.testing: npm run npm:install && npm run clean:dist && npm run webpack:production -- --env APP_ENV=testing
